channel.title: How to make a npc talk?
channel.description:
Hi, it's me again. Could you guys tell me how do I make a npc talk? like those mans in Lumbridge I right click on them and nothing happend. So yea, if you guys could tell me how do I do that, it would be appreciated. Also, can you guys tell me how can I lower the hits. Like they hit me 22 , 15 , 18... If you guys could help me with those 2 questions. I would really appricate that. Thanks in advance.
~ Macoronizer
